content.rendered:
Directed by Karan Johar

Written by Sumit Roy. Hussain Haidry

Cast Alia Bhatt (Dilras Banu Begum). Kareena Kapoor (Jahanara Begum). Janhvi Kapoor (Nadira Banu Begum). Anil Kapoor (Shah Jahan). Ranveer Singh (Dara Shukoh). Bhumi Pednekar (Roshanara Begum). Vicky Kaushal (Aurangzeb). Himanshu Jaykar (Shivam)

Languages Hindi

Producers Dimpy Agarwal. Qaisar Bukhsh. Ivano Fucci. Sandeep Gupta. Hiroo Johar. Pravin Khairnar. Apoorva Mehta. Somen Mishra. Sandeep Sharma. Somesh Shivraj

Production Dharma Production. The Fire Emoji Studio
